org.forgerock.openam.services

Class MailService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.json.resource.AbstractRequestHandler
      • org.forgerock.openam.services.MailService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestHandler

    public final class MailService
extends org.forgerock.json.resource.AbstractRequestHandler
    This CREST resource represents a service as opposed to some resource, hence it only implements action. The single action is "send" which is used to send an email. It utilises the existing email service configuration
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailService(MailServerLoader mailServerLoader)
      Creates a new CREST email service.
